title: Data Architect
description: As the Data Architect, you'll collaborate closely with engineering, analytics, governance, and business teams to drive best practices across both on-premise and cloud environments (AWS, Azure). The ideal candidate will align data architecture strategies with business objectives, enabling advanced analytics, AI/ML initiatives, and seamless operational data use.
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable, secure, and efficient enterprise data architecture aligned with business goals
Develop and maintain comprehensive data models (conceptual, logical, physical) that support business and analytical needs
Define and enforce data governance policies, standards, lineage, and metadata management practices
Drive integration across systems via ETL/ELT pipelines, APIs, and real-time streaming solutions
Optimize data storage and retrieval for structured and unstructured data across hybrid infrastructures
Collaborate with technical and business teams to enable data-driven decision-making
Ensure compliance with data privacy and protection regulations (e.g., GDPR, POPIA)
Evaluate emerging technologies to enhance scalability maintainability, and performance
Monitor and improve data quality, consistency, and system performance
Oversee and guide project lifecycles from inception to completion
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless project execution
Align project activities with business goals and objectives
Develop and maintain project schedules and budgets
Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies
qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, Information Systems, or a related discipline
Minimum 5 years of experience in data architecture role
